casebody.data:
First Department,

December, 1952.

(December 2, 1952.) In the Matter of the Arbitration between Trustees of Columbia University in the City of New York, Respondents, and Thomas Phillips, as President of Local Union No. 241, Transport Workers Union of America, C. I. O., Appellant.

Order unanimously affirmed, with $20 costs and disbursements to the respondents. No opinion. Present— Peck, P. J., Dore, Cohn and Callahan, JJ. [See post, p. 814.]
